list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a musical instrument, roughly triangular in shape, consisting of a frame supporting a graduated series of parallel strings, played by plucking with the fingers. The modern orchestral harp has an upright frame, with pedals that enable the strings to be retuned to different keys.
a marine mollusk which has a large vertically ribbed shell with a wide aperture, found chiefly in the Indo-Pacific.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Papa had been teaching him to play the blues harp
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Papa đã dạy anh ta chơi Harp blues

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: talk or write persistently and tediously on (a particular topic).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I don't want to harp on about the past
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không muốn đàn hạc về quá khứ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: among them harped the divine minstrel Demodocus
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong số họ đã đánh cắp Demod Focus Divine Minstrel
